ygData.subject: Re: The ship
ygData.msgSnippet: The sound of a roaring engine can be heard, and as it gets closer it comes to a stop. The shiny bright red car transforms, folding up into a standing position.

The sound of a roaring engine can be heard, and as it gets closer it 
comes to a stop. The shiny bright red car transforms, folding up into 
a standing position. He was closely followed by a interesting looking 
jet cruising on the ground, who also transformed, and landed beside 
him. "Hi, I'm Lightspeed, looks like we'll be partners on this 
voyage," the car said, holding out his hand friendly. The jet on the 
other hand looked nervous.
